column4: Hi everyone, I've got a problem with my Atheros wireless card with ubuntu 9.10. I've followed the guideo on the forums, its no longer stated as disabled, its now using ath_pci driver but its still not scanning for networks, anyone got any ideas?
try to blacklist the driver module?
: I'm pretty sure I've already done that, do you know which command it is?
add the module name at the bottom of /etc/modprobe.d/blacklist.conf
